The above represents total travel allowance, including any meals, tips, taxis, etc.
In other words, room and board, while at Madison, plus the flat sum indicated
will be the total reimbursement payable.
It will probably be possible to arrange for you to have your wife (and family if
desired) stay with you in the University housing (with you paying her share, of
course), but I will have to check on it. Will you please indicate whether or not
your wife will be accompanying you (so necessary arrangements can be made),
and children, too?
Will you please let me know, not later than June 5 whether or not you can attend
the seminar? We anticipate that all participants will arrive on Sunday the 16th
and depart after 5:00 p.m. on the 19th. (The planning committee will remain on
the 2 0th to map out the report of the seminar.)
I will try to work out the details re wives and children and advise you as soon as
possible.
Sincerely
Harold E. Hill )
